para1: Hola! We are very excited that you are planning to share our special day with us! We are really hoping that it will be third time lucky. The wedding will now take place on Saturday 25 June 2022 at 13.30 and we will be organising pre-wedding drinks in the Chamartín area on Friday 24 June 2022 from 19.30 until 22:30. We will also be arranging an informal picnic in Parque Berlín on Sunday 26 June 2022 from 12:00.
para2: We have created this website to share information about our wedding to help you plan your trip. Here are some of our top restaurant and shopping recommendations:
para3: In the meantime, if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at
